{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot | youtube.com/GamerRobot","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1770949,"totalDownVotes":111356,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[üî• üîµ UPDATE] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":211583,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"üî• üîµ UPDATE 17 Part 2 OUT NOW 
New awakening, new island, new boss raid, new weapon, and LOTS MORE! 

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2300
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Soul, and Dragon.

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

cash drop takes 30%

‚ô°Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls‚ô°","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios¬Æ","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":896733,"totalDownVotes":100918,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":8231,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"‚ú®üèπ„ÄéNEW UPDATE v0.9„Äè üèπ‚ú®
